content:
Our Services and Pricing:
We offer comprehensive web development solutions to suit every need. Our Basic Website Development package starts at ₹5,000 with 1 week delivery, perfect for small businesses. It includes 4-5 pages, social media integration, and a contact form.

Our Standard Website Development package at ₹7,000 (1 week delivery) offers 6-8 pages with enhanced functionality.

For e-commerce businesses, we provide complete online store solutions at ₹15,000 with 1 month delivery, including product management, inventory system, and payment integration.

Custom Solutions:
- Social Media App Development: ₹50,000 (6-8 months)
- Delivery App Development: ₹40,000 (1-6 months)

Technologies We Use:
We leverage cutting-edge technologies including React.js, Next.js for frontend, Node.js and Python for backend, MongoDB and MySQL for databases, and AWS/Google Cloud for hosting. We also offer mobile app development using React Native and Flutter, and integrate AI/ML capabilities when needed.

About Us:
We're a passionate team of developers and designers with over 10 years of experience. We've successfully delivered 100+ projects across various industries. Our focus is on creating innovative, scalable, and user-friendly digital solutions that help businesses grow online.

Contact Information:
Reach out to us anytime! We provide 24/7 support.
Email: support@iwebwiser.com
Phone: +91 XXXXXXXXXX
Working Hours: Always available for support

Visit us at /contact for more details.

Additional Services:
- Custom Website Development
- Mobile App Development
- E-commerce Solutions
- Social Media Integration
- SEO Optimization
- Cloud Hosting
- 24/7 Technical Support
- Maintenance and Updates

Why Choose Us:
- Experienced Team
- Competitive Pricing
- Quick Delivery
- Quality Assurance
- Ongoing Support
- Modern Technologies
- Custom Solutions
- Reliable Service
